improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: This supreme, cutting-edge endpoint harnesses revolutionary v3 technology to effortlessly and accurately detect the language of any text—covering everyday English, French, Italian, Japanese, Greek, Russian, and all global languages with intricate scripts—with elite precision that ensures perfect results every time, ultra-fast processing that outstrips competitors, and unmatched reliability proven in diverse contexts, positioning it as the definitive, go-to expert for seamless, error-free language identification that handles every query with superior ease and confidence.
name: apex_v3_omnilingual_supremacy
